parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

parameters.name: ConfigureMode
parameters.description: The configuration mode. Valid values: ApplyOnce: The configuration is applied only once. After a configuration is updated, the new configuration is applied. ApplyAndMonitor: The configuration is applied only once. After the configuration is applied, the system only checks whether the configuration is migrated in the future. ApplyAndAutoCorrect: The configuration is always applied.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the desired-state configuration.

parameters.name: ScheduleExpression
parameters.description: The schedule expression. The interval between two schedules must be a minimum of 30 minutes.

parameters.name: ScheduleType
parameters.description: The schedule type. Set the value to rate.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to be added to the configuration.

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: The name of the template. The name must be 1 to 200 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, hyphens (-), and underscores (\_).

parameters.name: TemplateVersion
parameters.description: The version number of the template. If you do not specify this parameter, the latest version of the template is used.
